short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Downloads AliExpress product description, images and videos with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Alitools downloader able to download product description, images and videos in ONE click with the best quality possible! It is a 100% free extension.

"Alitools - Download AliExpress Images & Videos" google chrome extension add new features to your browser. This Alitools allows you to save images and videos, description from AliExpress directly to your computer. Its super simple to use.
Best alternative for AliSave, Alisave Plus, Alidownloader & Aliniche.


▬▬▬▬ GETTING STARTED ▬▬▬▬▬

1. Install the extension by clicking the “Add to chrome” button.
2. Open an AliExpress product page.
3. Click on the download buttons next to the product images.

You can also the app window by clicking on the icon on the top right of your browser and start downloading!

▬▬▬▬▬ FEATURES ▬▬▬▬▬

- Download main product images
- Variations images and pictures from description
- Get the best quality image download
- Save time and download ALL images in one click
- Open download directory after download
- Right click to download images with the BEST QUALITY possible
- Save product’s VIDEOS

 ▬▬Queries▬▬

▬▬▬▬ DISCLAIMER ▬▬▬▬▬

By installing the Alitools Download AliExpress Images & Videos Chrome extension, you accept the terms of the user agreement and allow redirecting you to the links of the affiliate program AliExpress.

The extension is NOT affiliated with or endorsed by Alibaba Group or any of the other marketplaces like aliexpress.com and alibaba.com
